snowbound.api

Class Entity<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • snowbound.api.Entity<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Base, Team, Tile, Unit

    public abstract class Entity<E>
extends Object
    An entity is equivalent to itself regardless of the turn. That is, while the state of the same unit may differ from turn to turn, references to the same unit from different turns are equivalent using the equals method. Similarly, an entity's hash code will remain constant across turns.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object o)
      Defines entity equality as ID equality (as opposed to state equality).
      int hashCode()
      Defines entity hash codes based solely on the entity ID.
